00021 //
00022 // Module Manager
00023 //
00024 // wxPluginManager would be MUCH better, but it's an "undocumented" framework.
00025 //
00026 #define ModuleDispatchName "ModuleDispatch"
00027 
00028 typedef enum
00029 {
00030    ModuleInitialize,
00031    ModuleTerminate,
00032    AppInitialized,
00033    ProjectInitialized
00034 } ModuleDispatchTypes;
00035 
00036 typedef int AUDACITY_DLL_API (*fnModuleDispatch)(ModuleDispatchTypes type);
00037 
00038 class Module
00039 {
00040 public:
00041    Module(const wxString & name);
00042    virtual ~Module();
00043 
00044    bool Load();
00045    void Unload();
00046    int Dispatch(ModuleDispatchTypes type);
00047 
00048 private:
00049    wxString mName;
00050    wxDynamicLibrary *mLib;
00051    fnModuleDispatch mDispatch;
00052 };
00053 
00054 class ModuleManager:public wxModule
00055 {
00056 public:
00057    ModuleManager() {};
00058    virtual ~ModuleManager() {};
00059 
00060    virtual bool OnInit();
00061    virtual void OnExit();
00062 
00063    static void Initialize();
00064    static int Dispatch(ModuleDispatchTypes type);
00065 
00066 private:
00067    static ModuleManager *mInstance;
00068 
00069    wxArrayPtrVoid mModules;
00070 
00071    DECLARE_DYNAMIC_CLASS(ModuleManager);
00072 };
